textBeforeTable: Mongol is not present in (or the article has not been created for) the following games : Other games Main article: Mongol (CivRev) Civilization Revolution Main article: Mongol (Civ5) Civilization V Main article: Mongol (Civ4) Civilization IV Main article: Mongol (Civ3) Civilization III Main article: Mongol (Civ2) Civilization II Main article: Mongol (Civ1) Civilization For simplicity, all are gathered on this page. The page for an individual game article should carry that game's name, linked from this page by a "redirect" if it is not "Mongol (...)". This page should not have great detail: give it just enough to show aspects that are noticeably different in a particular game. Whereas Civ1, Civ2, C-evo, Freeciv, and possibly Civ3 use "Mongol", Civ4 and Civ5 and CivRev apparently have Mongolians, which is probably logical if there are nations such as Uzbeks and Kazakhs and Tajiks and Georgians in the game occupying what used to be Mongol territory in the broad sense.
